requires assignment to co object: use transaction OKB9 and remove the G/L account for that company code
can only be posted internally: use tcode FS00 and untick post automatically from control tab
posting period variant not assigned: use Tcode ob52 to put those periods
business partner requires External assig: use SPRO to customize the cross application component and also assign the number ranges both from BP to vendors
Reconciliation account has not an entry: Go to system in SAP easy access and go to user parameters and remove the default parameter BUK
